extendedInfo.description: EasyNote is the #1 powerful and easy-to-use free notepad app that helps you remember everything on your cell phone. EasyNote helps you create notes very rapidly and the notes are color coded so you can find them instantly. Ever had thoughts & idea that flash through your mind? Quickly take them down in notes. Be on track of your daily schedule & to-dos. Stay organized, save your ideas and improve productivity. EasyNote lets you take notes, create to-do lists, record shopping list, and makes these notes completely searchable.KEY FEATURES:- Create and edit text notes, to-dos and task lists- Sticky note widget for home screen- Organize notes by 5 different color- Passcode protection- Backup notes to SD card- Search for text inside notes- Sort by color, tile and modified time- Reminder for checklists and notes- Share notes with friends and colleagues via Emails, SMS, Facebook, Tweeter & more

reviews.title: Best Note Pad/ To do list :-bd
reviews.comment: Best notepad app on playstore with awesome features! :D could be a little cripser though.
reviews.author: gino tang

reviews.title: Easy to use the app. Color coding makes it a sinch.
reviews.comment: Love the ease of use and the ability to make my own personal adjustments.

reviews.title: Easy,  great!
reviews.comment: Straight forward note app. Nice,  simple widgets.

reviews.title: its awesome, complete, give you 5star
reviews.comment: so far i use it, its complete that i want. simple, easy, clean, with alarm, passcode, cant delete without pass, actualy with protect app. Good Job. its perfect. thanks. *update : please add a sync/backup with google.drive

reviews.title: Easiest way to remember quick bits of info.

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Excellent app but if u want to add some future I have suggetion . I had to done xyz activity 9.30 pm.... Xyz done 9.30 pm automatic write time

reviews.title: Real nice
reviews.comment: Haven\'t used it long but so far best one I\'ve tried- don\'t have to confirm everything one touch and your there- well thought out app

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: Used it for my grocery shoping. I loved that, when I got the item, I tap-ed the written word and a line across that word was made, without the edit-delete hustle! Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Ellada Kotanidou

reviews.title: Great but 4 one item
reviews.comment: When one hits the Home button  for 2 seconds the just archived note is still visible regardless of any password use. How do you completely exit requiring a PW to view anything? Needs an exit.
reviews.author: C Mahan

reviews.title: Love the easynote app but...
reviews.comment: The remind button won\'t wory. Sometime its force me to close the app. Its all started when I updated to the latest version. I\'m using GB on moto atrix 2.. hope you can me help with this. really the app. thanks.

reviews.comment: I forgot my password and cannot enter the app i lost all my lists, every time i enter it has a good news thing saying enter my password can someone help?  My email is roisinannemiller@gmail.com

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Very easy and helpful! I was able to coordinate my grocery list with my weekly meal menus very quickly!!! I recommend this app!

reviews.title: My fav note taking app
reviews.comment: I use this app all the time I love it so much becuse its not only very easy and fast but it also as a lock so I can quickly jot notes down no matter how fast the info is being gave to me and then I can lock the app so no one can read my notes are erase them. i\'ve used other note taking apps and have not fould even one that even comes close to how great this one is
